# regionMonitoringResponseDelayed

**Type Property**

A constant that indicates Core Location will deliver events but they may be delayed.

## Declaration

```swift
static var regionMonitoringResponseDelayed: CLError.Code { get }
```

## Discussion

The user information dictionary might contain an alternate region that you can monitor instead. Use the [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLError-swift.struct/alternateRegion] property to retrieve the [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLRegion] object.

## Getting region monitoring errors

- **regionMonitoringDenied**: A constant that indicates the user denied access to the region monitoring service.
- **regionMonitoringFailure**: A constant that indicates the location manager failed to monitor a registered region.
- **regionMonitoringSetupDelayed**: A constant that indicates Core Location couldn’t initialize the region monitoring feature immediately.
